body_html: @dizcza I think they dynamically load the cudnn library from the system path. Because for the same code, if I put the cudnn lib in LD_LIBRARY_PATH, the gpu memory cost much more less than the cudnn is not in the system path.
body_text: @dizcza I think they dynamically load the cudnn library from the system path. Because for the same code, if I put the cudnn lib in LD_LIBRARY_PATH, the gpu memory cost much more less than the cudnn is not in the system path.
body: @dizcza I think they dynamically load the cudnn library from the system path. Because for the same code, if I put the cudnn lib in LD_LIBRARY_PATH, the gpu memory cost much more less than the cudnn is not in the system path.
